"Three-quarters of the words in the booklet were in German," Sergio Marchionne told said in his remarks. If you think that there's no English equivalent to a word you use in German, you're nuts. Daimler, the maker of Mercedes Benz vehicles, bought Chrysler in 1998 and ultimately sold the company to Cerberus in 2007. his introduction of a bill to make it harder to subpoena reporters. Mike Pence has been a favorite of reporters because of his accessibility and affability.
